document_data.name: Offices of the Middle Magistrate
document_data.mainbody: The '''offices of the Middle Magistrate''' were the base of operations of the [[Middle Magistrate (Bral)|Middle Magistrate]] of [[Bral]].
document_data.Location: The complex was located on [[Trader's Way (Bral)|Trader's Way]] in [[Middle City]], on the leading starboard side of Bral's [[Great Market (Bral)|Great Market]], about a half block away and around the corner from the [[Gamalon's Curios|curios shop]] of [[Gamalon Idogyr]], the famous [[Tethyrian]] [[mage]].
document_data.Structure: The complex consisted of several connected buildings: a courtroom, a jail with six cells, a barracks for the Magistrate's Watch, and offices. The architecture here was far less fancy than that of the [[Offices of the High Magistrate|High Magistrate's]].
document_data.Activities: The Watch of the Middle City were far more active than those of the [[High City]] and included about 20 guardsmen and several [[mage]]s. Guardsmen were well-equipped They patrolled in groups of four to a dozen, though only occasionally, unless they were summoned to apprehend a particularly dangerous criminal.
